::Dark Lavacons/Dollen::

       Starlight was hit in the chest by the optic lazers, and went flying
back, and hit a tree.

      "RRR!" She yelled, firing another shot at GoldenEye.


       Astral hovered in the air, and then watched the shots coming at him.

     "YEEEEEEEEOOOOUUUUUCCCCCCCHHHHH!!!!!" Astral screamed in pain as a
plasma shot blew a chunk off of his foot.

       Astral suddenly had an idea in his head.

      "Fall back!!  Fall back!!!!!" He ordered.

      The Dark Lavacons looked puzzled, but Fenox was always loyal, and he
and the others followed Astral as he flew off.

     "So, Astral, what are you plotting now?" Fenox asked.

    "You'll see, my friend, as soon as we reach where we are headed," Astral
replied.

    Fenox asked, "And where exactly are we headed?"

    Astral grinned, looking straight ahead while flying.

    "To be honest, Fenox, I do not know, all I know is that we are heading
for somewhere peaceful," Astral said.

        After that, Fenox asked no more, and continued concentrating on
flying.
